--- In nbwrpg@y..., Alloran2@a... wrote:
> :::Cyclonus:::
> 
> Cyclonus: Alright, let's head back to base.
> ::he transforms to vehicle mode and starts flying back to the base::


    ::Blindchaos and Domnijoe::

    Domnijoe passed uncertain glances between Cyclonus and Wildrider. 
Behind her, Blindchaos smiled gleefully as he dragged himself from
the 
ruins of the downed ship. He shook the dust and wreckage from his 
Anklyosaur format and pulled up beside the Decepticon female. He 
stared at her expectantly as Cyclonus flew off. 
    "Gonna give me a ride?" he asked. His grin seemed to glow....just 
to tick her off.
     The female Decepticon sighed, rolled her optical sensors and 
reluctantly transformed. 
     Her cockpit opened. 
     "Alriiiight." she said, irritated. "get in."
     Blindchaos snickered and transformed. His transformation was 
quiet and smooth, more of a musical hiss than a multi-tone warble.
He hastily climbed into Domnijoe's cockpit and shut himself in. 
Seconds later Domnijoe was in the air widely circling Wildrider
before 
she took off after Cyclonus, engines roaring.

Northlight
Domnijoe Productions
